verbose_text: Western blot analysis (XREF_FIG) and immunofluorescence staining (XREF_FIG) also demonstrated that 4-MU suppressed the expression of CD44 and EGFR, decreasing their expression to levels similar to those of the cells not stimulated with TGF-beta1 and disrupted the CD44-EGFR co-localization induced by TGF-beta1 (XREF_FIG).
